#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
        int n,k,i,sum = 0;
 
        cin >> n >> k;
                
        int a[1000];
 
        for ( i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) {
                cin >> a[i];
        }
        for ( i = 1; i <= n-k; i++ ) {
                sum = sum - a[i];
        }
        for ( i = n-k+1; i <= n; i++ ) {
                sum = sum + a[i];
        }
        cout << sum << endl;
        return 0;
}
